project_descr: Climate Information  Early Warning Systems in Tanzania.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to strengthen the weather, climate and hydrological monitoring capabilities, early warning systems and available information for responding to extreme weather and planning adaptation to climate change in Tanzania.

document_name: Stregthening climate information and early warning systems in Tanzania for climate resilient development and adaptation to climate change projects - Mid-Term Review
